text: Floriana Lima (born March 26, 1981) is an American actress and model. She played Maggie Sawyer on The CW's Supergirl. She began playing recurring character Darcy Cooper in season 2 of the ABC drama A Million Little Things. In 2018, Lima played Krista Dumont in the second season of Netflix's The Punisher. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from Ohio Category:Actors from Cincinnati
title: Floriana Lima
